packs.name: Graves
packs.description: When you die, it places a grave to save all your drops. Hit a grave to retrieve your items. /function graves/config

packs.name: XP Bottling
packs.description: Right-Click an enchanting table with an empty bottle to fill it with some of your XP. Consume an XP Bottle to losslessly get your XP back. /function xp_bottling/config
